analysis.key_quote: This "regulation" will result in a purge of talented, knowledgeable, dedicated employees who faithfully serve the American people and will leave a wake of devastation in this country it will take decades to recover from.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of civil servants following the law and the dangers of politicization, indicating a concern for the integrity of the civil service and the potential loss of merit-based protections.
